title: Wednesday's big stock stories: What's likely to move the market in the next trading session
summary: CNBC's Stocks @ Night is a daily newsletter delivered after hours, giving you a first look at tomorrow and last look at today. Here's what CNBC TV's producers were watching as stocks rebounded on Tuesday.

title: Ceylon Graphite Provides Default Status Report
summary: Ceylon Graphite Corp. (TSX-V: CYL) (OTC: CYLYF) (FSE: CCY) is providing this default status report in accordance with National Policy 12-203 – Management Cease Trade Orders. On July 30, 2024, the Company announced that it was not in a position to file its audited financial statements, CEO and CFO certifications, and management discussion and analysis (the “Annual Filings”) for the year ended March 31, 2024 on or before July 29, 2024.

title: Artificial Intelligence  ( AI )  Market Size in Automotive Anticipated to Exceed USD 13.0 Billion by 2034, with a CAGR of 15.6%: Transparency Market Research Inc.
summary: The global artificial intelligence (AI) market in automotive is estimated to thrive at a CAGR of 15.6% from 2024 to 2034. A significant driver is the rise of edge computing in automotive AI applications. The emergence of AI-powered cybersecurity solutions is gaining traction in the automotive sector.

title: TRILLIUM ACQUISITION CORP. ANNOUNCES SECURED LOAN RELATED TO BUSINESS COMBINDATION AGREEMENT
summary: Trillium is a capital pool company created pursuant to the policies of the TSX Venture Exchange (the "TSXV") It has not commenced commercial operations and has no assets other than cash. The Company intends to provide Bankview 1827 Investment Corp. with a secured loan in the amount of $225,000. The Loan shall bear the prime interest rate of the Royal Bank of Canada per annum.

title: Global Uranium Files Preliminary Base Shelf Prospectus
summary: Global Uranium Corp. focuses on exploring and developing uranium assets primarily in North America. The Company currently holds seven key uranium projects: the Wing Lake Property in the Mudjatik Domain of Northern Saskatchewan, Canada.

title: Ethereum Mobile Game 'Guild of Guardians' Reveals First Expansion

Carbuncle $2,560.67 Carbuncle$7.98 Carbuncle$10.82 Carbuncle$328.93 Carbuncle$4.10 Carbuncle$5.99 Carbuncle $1.056.

title: Guild of Guardians Cools Things Off with New Legendary Guardians, Gameplay Updates, and Worlds to Explore in Frostmire Expansion
summary: Frostmire will introduce players to a brand new snowy locale, rife with new dungeons and lore, as well as two new Legendary Guardians to add to their rosters. The expansion will introduce Level 7 equipment and gear that can be used to outfit Guardians to provide additional benefits during gameplay and strengthen players' squads.

title: Generac CEO says pressure on the power grid 'is only going to get worse' from weather and technology
summary: The pressure on the power grid is only going to increase, Aaron Jagdfeld, CEO of generator company Generac, told CNBC. The increased demand for technology like artificial intelligence and electric vehicles will continue to weigh on the grid, he said.

title: Jim Cramer looks at Amazon and Apple and why it can be tough to sit on good stocks
summary: CNBC's Jim Cramer explains why it can be difficult for investors to sit on solid stocks. Cramer recapped action in the stocks of Apple and Amazon, which received downgrades on Monday. He said bulls ignore downside risks and bears ignore opportunities.

title: Zealand Pharma provides U.S. regulatory update on dasiglucagon in congenital hyperinsulinism
summary: Zealand Pharma provides U.S. regulatory update on dasiglucagon in congenital hyperinsulinism. Zealand Pharma A/S (Nasdaq: ZEAL) is a biotechnology company focused on the discovery and development of innovative peptide-based medicines.

title: Nvidia Stock Rallied  ( Again )  Today and Is Near a New All-Time High. Is the Stock Still a Buy?
summary: N Nvidia (NVDA 4.05%) stock has started off October with a bang. After suffering through an epic meltdown over the summer, things are beginning to look up. CEO Jensen Huang said the demand for Nvidia's next-generation AI architecture is "insane"

title: Why Investors Were Hot on Oracle Stock Today
summary: Oracle could become a significant partner of one of the most important AI companies on the scene. If these discussions are occurring, they are at an early stage, and investors should not pile into Oracle stock on that basis alone.

title: Investor Notice: Robbins LLP Informs Stockholders of the Class Action Lawsuit Filed Against Iris Energy Limited - Iris Energy  ( NASDAQ:IREN )
summary: Robbins LLP is Investigating Allegations that Iris Energy Limited (IREN) Misled Investors regarding its Prospects with Data Centers and High-Performance Computing. Shareholders who want to serve as lead plaintiff for the class must submit their application to the court by December 6, 2024. You do not have to participate in the case to be eligible for a recovery.

title: Why Soleno Therapeutics Stock Blasted 9% Higher Today
summary: Soleno Therapeutics (SLNO 9.11%) had some good news to report on the regulatory front on Tuesday. Investors were cheered by this as evidenced by their sending the biotech's stock more than 9% higher in price on the day. The company's Prader-Willi treatment inched closer to FDA approval.

title: Investor Notice: Robbins LLP Informs Stockholders of the Class Action Lawsuit Filed Against Elanco Animal Health Incorporated - Elanco Animal Health  ( NYSE:ELAN )
summary: A shareholder filed a class action on behalf of all persons and entities who purchased or otherwise acquired Elanco Animal Health Incorporated securities between November 7, 2023 and June 26, 2024. Elanco is an animal health company that develops, manufactures, and markets products for pets and farm animals.

title: Why Nvidia Stock Popped Again Today
summary: Shares of Nvidia (NVDA 4.05%) gained for the fifth day in a row. Wall Street continued to up its estimates on the AI chip leader. Foxconn and Nvidia are building Taiwan's largest supercomputer, built on the new Blackwell platform.

title: Paragon 28 Class Action has Commenced: Johnson Fistel Encourages Shareholders to Reach Out for More Information Regarding a Potential Recovery of Losses - Paragon 28  ( NYSE:FNA )
summary: Johnson Fistel, LLP is a nationally recognized shareholder rights law firm with offices in California, New York, Georgia, and Colorado. Shareholders who incurred losses during the class period, have until November 29, 2024, to move the court to become a lead plaintiff in this action.

title: In Preparation for Hurricane Milton Landfall, Verizon Offers Relief to Impacted Customers - Verizon Communications  ( NYSE:VZ )
summary: From Oct. 9th to Oct. 23rd, Verizon will waive domestic call, text, and data usage for postpaid consumer and Verizon Small Business customers in the following Florida counties. Any overages for those whose billing cycles have already closed will be automatically credited back.

title: In Preparation for Hurricane Milton Landfall, Verizon Offers Relief to Impacted Customers
summary: From Oct. 9th to Oct. 23rd, Verizon will waive domestic call, text, and data usage for postpaid consumer and Verizon Small Business customers* in the following Florida counties. Any overages for those whose billing cycles have already closed will be automatically credited back.

title: Why Eli Lilly Was Such a Healthy Stock Today
summary: The Congressional Budget Office (CBO) put a number on one piece of that market's potential. As that figure was large, weight loss drug producer Eli Lilly (LLY 1.70%) saw a nearly 2% bump in its share price in response.

title: Why Honeywell Stock Topped the Market on Tuesday
summary: The company is forging ahead with its long-term goal of becoming leaner and more focused. Honeywell plans to spin off its advanced materials business unit. It is part of a broader effort by management to slim down and become a more focused operation.

title: Pricing of CNH Industrial Capital Canada Ltd. Cdn$300 million notes
summary: CNH Industrial N.V. (NYSE: CNH) announced that its indirect wholly owned subsidiary, CNH Industrial Capital Canada Ltd., has priced Cdn$300 million in aggregate principal amount of 4.00% notes due April 11, 2028. The notes are being offered on a private placement basis to certain accredited investors in each of the provinces of Canada.

title: NOVONIX and ICoNiChem Enter into Collaboration Agreement Focused on Sustainable Cathode Material Feedstock
summary: NOVONIX and ICoNiChem have been selected for funding under the 2024 Canada-UK critical minerals call for proposals. The 2-year project, with a total budget of CAD $515,686, aims to further improve the sustainability of the NOVONIX all-dry, zero-waste technology.

title: Bitcoin Holders Lock Up $1.4 Billion as Babylon Staking Expands
summary: Bitcoin Holders Lock Up $1.4 Billion as Babylon Staking Expands. $62,124.00 is the current market value of the Bitcoin network. $2,437.27 is the average price of a single Bitcoin.

title: Johnson Fistel Urges WEBTOON Entertainment Inc. Shareholders to Contact the Firm Before the Class Action Deadline to Learn About Their Rights - Webtoon Entertainment  ( NASDAQ:WBTN )
summary: The lawsuit seeks to recover losses on behalf of investors who acquired securities pursuant and/or traceable to the Company's initial public offering conducted in June 2024 (the "IPO"). If you wish to serve as lead plaintiff, you must move the Court no later than November 4, 2024.

title: GM expects 2025 earnings to be similar to this year despite industry headwinds
summary: GM expects its 2025 adjusted earnings to be in a "similar range" to the company's results this year. The Detroit automaker's targeted adjusted earnings before interest and taxes for 2024 were between $13 billion and $15 billion.

title: EXCLUSIVE: Cannabis Rescheduling Is Not Cure-All For Industry Problems: Experts Explain How Tax Tactics Could Hurt Marijuana Businesses In Long Run
summary: Rescheduling is "not a Panacea to all the problems of the industry," says Frank Segall, co-chair of cannabis practice at Blank Rome. The shift of cannabis to Schedule III would not result in big players like Wells Fargo crossing over to the marijuana industry.

title: ThreeD Capital Inc. Announces New Investor Relations Agreement - ThreeD Cap  ( OTC:IDKFF )
summary: ThreeD Capital Inc. has entered into an agreement with PHK Investments LLC to provide investor relations services to the Company. PHK will engage with investors through various digital marketing and social media platforms, to facilitate greater investor awareness and widespread dissemination of ThreeD's news.

title: ThreeD Capital Inc. Announces New Investor Relations Agreement
summary: ThreeD Capital Inc. has entered into an agreement with PHK Investments LLC to provide investor relations services to the Company. The services provided by PHK are to commence as of October 8, 2024 and will continue for a 12-month term (resulting in an annual fee of £82,500, approximately $112,275 CAD)
